title: Arslan Senki (The Heroic Legend of Arslan)
synopsis: In the medieval kingdom of Pars, young Prince Arslan confronts the hostility of his father and the disinterest of his mother, and yearns to learn more about the world. Despite being surrounded by poverty and slavery, Arslan persists in seeing the possibility of a nobler world. Everything changes when the neighboring nation of Lusitania invades Pars, and Arslan is forced to grow up in an instant.
voices: ['Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Inoue, Kazuhiko', 'Shiozawa, Kaneto', 'Yao, Kazuki', 'Katsuki, Masako', 'Ikeda, Shuuichi', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Sasaki, Nozomu', 'Ootsuka, Akio', 'Watanabe, Kumiko']
staff: [['Amino, Tetsuro', ['Director']], ['Hamatsu, Mamoru', ['Director']], ['Fujiyama, Fusanobu', ['Sound Director']], ['Nogami, Kazuo', ['Episode Director']]]
